item.description:
.

Have you got a Valentine's Date? If not, maybe you can score one, after the fact ;)

Please read entire email to avoid confusion. Free public parking across the street. Try and get there 15 minutes prior to the time, to check in.

VALENTINES SPEED DATING SPECIAL
ONLY $15

ON February 18, 2011 at 7pm for 55+ age group (sorry, ladies full)

other dates for other age groups, at same venue, are as follows:

Feb. 9th
6:30pm for 45-55 yrs (sorry, ladies to be guaranteed a seat, you must be confirmed as of 2/7)
8:30pm for 35-45 yrs.

Feb. 11th
7:30pm for the “under 35” crowd

(dancing with DJ follows on the 11th and 18th)


Go on up to 10 dates in one fun-filled evening.
Less pressure and no feelings of rejection.
A fun, upscale way to meet people and/or network.

You've heard about this exciting, new trend on popular talk-shows and the news, now it's time to try it.


Preregister by emailing me, if there is no room walk-ins can not be accepted. And remember I am not the age police, please sign up for the group that is most suitable to your needs ;)


No need to reply "yes" here, for privacy reasons, if you wish, but in your mail correspondence please include the date/time you will be attending, as well as your email and phone contact, in the event of weather cancellations.
item.how_to_find_us: look for the marquis sign "48 Below" in downtown Exeter, we'll be in downstairs lounge
item.why: It's a great way to meet the opposite sex, in a fun atmosphere, on a one-on-one basis ;)

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Valentines Day Speed dating!
